Description: LIMOUSINE DRIVERS / TAXI DRIVERS (100 nos)Salary: AED 2,000 (basic) +  AED 500(accommodation) + up to (500) commission on performance.- Employment Visa + Medical Insurance provided by the Co.Skills
Skills:
- Valid UAE driving license
Ability to converse in English with customer (speaking and understanding).
- Minimum 5 Years of Home Country with 6 Months Dubai Driving Experience is Required.

- Should be able to join immediately as priority 1.
- Taxi Driving Experience shall be considered.
- Age Required : 25 to 40 years.
- Valid UAE driving license
- PVC should be provided by the candidate.
